mapper.select: select c.comment_Id, c.board_Id, c.guest_nickname, c.content, c.register_date, m.nickname member_nickname, a.nickname admin_nickname from tbl_comment c left join tbl_member m on m.member_id = c.member_id left join tbl_admin a on a.admin_id = c.admin_id where board_id=#{boardId};
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_comment(board_id, member_id, content) values(#{boardId}, #{memberId}, #{content})
insert into tbl_comment(board_id, admin_id, content) values(#{boardId}, #{adminId}, #{content})
insert into tbl_comment(board_id, guest_nickname, guest_password, content) values(#{boardId}, #{guestNickname}, #{guestPassword}, #{content})
